mapper.select: select * from note where (m_no=#{param1} and m_pa_no=#{param2}) or (m_no=#{param2} and m_pa_no=#{param1}) order by n_date
select id from member where m_no=#{param1}
select m_no from member where id=#{param1}
select m_no,#{param1},#{param2},#{param3} from #{param4} where (#{param5} like #{param7}) or (#{param6} like #{param7})
